meaningMnemonic: You have <radical>mouth</radical> <radical>vines</radical>, so you <kanji>shout</kanji>! It's hard for you to talk normally, and even harder for people to understand you unless you shout.
readingMnemonic: You need to <kanji>shout</kanji> so that people can understand you through the mouth vines. You shout, "<reading>きょう</reading>と!" because you hear there is a temple there for people with your condition.
